meanings.definition: A type of fish with a long, slender body and a long tail.
meanings.sent1: The ratfishes swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of ratfishes while snorkeling.
meanings.sent3: The ratfishes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed behind her like the tail of a ratfishes.
meanings.sent5: The ratfishes shimmered in the sunlight, their scales glistening.
